name: Stay Alive (CindyHan)
description:
This is a 2D survival game and just use mouse click. 

Player need to contorl four characters and the goal of this game is to survive to 20 days and can get the final answer of the story. 

In this game, characters have three attributes -- health, mood and power, explore and get hurt will reduce health, random events and other characters die will reduce mood, build and protect will reduce power. Health or mood to 0 will die, power to 0 can't protect and build. 

There is a day and night cycle, characters need to be arranged to explore, sleep, build or protecting. 

Go out to explore can get materials so that can build and make food at home. 

There are some random events will happen. Once a event happen, each character’s mind will reduce. The probability of a random event is determined by the number of protectors and their strength, more protectors and higher strength will have fewer random events. 

It’s important for players to pay more attention to keep a balance between characters’s attributes

Background story: All of a sudden, the town is hit by a gigantic wave...no one knows what caused it, It ruined infrastructures, houses and not one people standing, except for a child, a boy, a woman and an old...now they have to try their best to survive and figure out the secret of this disaster....
